minions.name: Archmage
minions.description: Ongoing: You may play an extra action on each of your turns

minions.name: Chronomage
minions.description: You may play an extra action this turn

minions.name: Neophyte
minions.description: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an action, you may place it in your hand or play it as an extra action. Otherwise, return it to the top of your deck

actions.name: Mass Enchantment
actions.description: Reveal the top card of each other player's deck. Play one revealed action as an extra action. Return unused cards to the top of their decks

actions.name: Portal
actions.description: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Place any number of minions revealed into your hand. Return the other cards to the top of your deck in any order

actions.name: Sacrifice
actions.description: Choose one of your minions. Draw cards equal to its power. Destroy that minion

actions.name: Scry
actions.description: Search your deck for an action and reveal it to all players. Place it into your hand and shuffle your deck

actions.name: Winds of Change
actions.description: Shuffle your hand into your deck and draw five cards. You may play an extra action
